Worki on pure figtter's instinct, he grabs it, whirls around... ...and finds himself in a wild Mexican standoff. He's got the RPG aimed at the dragon, who still has The P in its maw. The boy's alive. Blood trickles from his lips Van Zan rises from the ground, sees the situation.
Shoot it! Quinn puts his finger on the trigger...and hesitates. (CONTINUED)
The dragon starts backing toward its burrow.
What are you waiting for? SHOOT!!
It's got your man!! Van Zan's eye flits from the Dragon to The Pope. The boy looks at him, coughing blood but still defiant. He nods at Van Zan. And we go into
Van Zan suddenly makes a run at the dragon. From his ches he pulls a GRENADE. Quinn yells, tries to stop him. Van Zan gets near the beast, DIVES aside, tosses the gren
who catches it in his free hand, rips the pin with his te
Bite me. The Pope SLAMS GRENADE AGAINST HIMSELF IN THE DRAGON'S MO We don't see the explosion that engulfs both the Dragon a the boy; only Quinn's horrified reaction.
Banners high and triumphant, Van Zan's militia and the firemen make their way from the killing fields, the drago carcasses Still smouldering behind them.
Quinn drives in tense silence. Creedy sits shotgun.
There's nothin' you coulda done. (No response. ) The lad was dead meat, you know that. (No response) For Chrissakes, Quinn, it was merciful... (CONTINUED)
Tryin' to save him woulda been merciful. Creedy is silent.
Doesn't it bother you, what he did?
Honestly? Those worms bothered me more. And he killed ‘em...
Goosh's truck pumps ROCK 'N' ROLL TUNES into a courtyard filled with people. A party's in progress.

Danny pulls pints from old beer kegs, serves them to the firemen and Van Zan's militia. Creedy grabs some glasses, carries them to Van Zan, who sits at the "table of honor" Gideon stands atop the council table, reciting the day's exploits like a medieval bard. Eddie accompanies him on a bodahrun (irish drum).

.+..and you who saw this today: remember it. Tell it to your children. Tell dem about de man who shook hands wid Destiny. (Points at Van Zan.) De St. George of Cincinnati. (Cheers from the crowd) De Beowulf of da Bronx! (Louder cheers.)
The crowd erupts with the HUGEST CHEERS yet. Van Zan smil broadly, not feigning the faintest attempt at modesty. Colleen takes a seat next to Quinn, who is unusually quie She nudges him.
You okay? Quinn half-smiles, looks back warily at Van Zan, Cries of SPEECH! SPEECH! from the crowd. Van Zan rises modestly, puts up his arms for quiet. The crowd hushes. (CONTINUED)
I've been to many places. Liberated many towns. But I want you to know, it is a special honor to be here tonight... From one of his soldiers, he takes a folded CLOTH.

..-and it is a personal privilege to Claim your island...as the 51st state of the United States of America! He unfolds the cloth: it's a U.S. FLAG. The Englishmen react to the joke with good~natured...
Boo! Bollocks! Yer arse! The Americans strike up a chorus of...
“My country 'tis of thee, sweet land of liberty, of thee I sing..." Not to be outdone, Quinn and his men start a chorus of
"God save our sovr'gn Queen, God save our gracious Queen, God save our queen..." Both songs have the same tune.
"Land of the pilgrims' pride Land where our fathers died..." "Prom e-e-every mountainside..." And soon, whether the lyrics match or not, all are singin the same song.
"Let freedom ring!" The moment is unexpectantly moving for all present. As th song ends, the group erupts in CHEERS and APPLAUSE.
Tell you what. Creedy'1ll give you Cumbria if you stay through winter. (CONTINUED)
( Fookin' A. We got three worms in Workington need dustin'.
Those four in leeds...
Two in Canterbury...
London. The mention of that name throws them all off a beat.
What?
Main stop on the tour, ladies. Why you think we're here? An uncomfortable silence has fallen among the English.
You...don't wanna go to London, mate.
That's Ashley's town.
Well, next week it'll be mine. Everyone is silent. You can hear a pin drop.
Jesus wept,. doesn't it bother you people? The bitch that started this whole mess sleeps 200 miles away.
Sure, but...you gotta understand...
Ashley's different.
How?
Well, we can tell you what we've heard. (CONTINUED)
"Heard"? You tellin' me none of you have even seen this thing? Nobody answers. But slowly, they all turn to Quinn. Van Zan moves his chair over to him.
Go ahead, Chief. Enlighten us. What's it like, this..."Ashley"? Quinn smiles grimly.
The Mosquito skims over the hilly landscape.
Quinn flies. Van Zan sits in the gunner's seat, staring a FADED POSTCARD seen earlier on Quinn's wall: the PHOTO OF CASTLE with inscription: PEMBREY CASTLE.
Man who trained me was Fire Chief here. Pretty much how it looked back then.
So? Quinn just gestures to the window. Van 2an looks out as t plane rises above a ridge. Veteran though he is, even Van Zan isn’t prepared for the sight that now spills across the horizon...
It's not just been destroyed; it's been erased. As if God torn it apart stone by stone, then melted it to the groun

A dance floor of death. Weapons lie melted on rock next t HIROSHIMA SILHOUETTES of people incinerated where they fought. Charred clothes, cracked utensils, melted toys li strewn over the site like surreal decorations.
Fall a '16 they were strong, bold, proud. When their Fire Chief called for a raid on London, everyone cheered. (CONTINUED)

FIND Quinn and Van Zan walking through the wreckage. QUINN (cont'd) He knew the risks, a course. Twelve castles'd already gone up against Ashley. Men went to London. Never come back. But Ashley always did... Quinn kneels, picks at something on the ground.

She'd follow their trails home. Then burn every man, woman an’ child to the ground. We see what Quinn has been picking at: CHILDREN'S CRAYONS meited over the ground. The color is almost pretty agains the scorched background.
But my old Chief, he was gonna be different. He comes to my castle, tells me how he's gonna do the old girl. Asks for my help.
You give it to him?
CLOSE ON a large CROSS, crudely fashioned with old rusted metal pipes. It's been set in the ground as a gravemarker

Dug these, didn't I? REVEAL IT IS ONE IN A VAST FIELD OF GRAVEMARKERS. Hundred of similar crosses stretching to the horizon. Wind blows through the pipe-crucifixes, making hollow, almost musica sounds. Like ghosts, whispering to each other.
If I'd had sense, I'da beaten the shite out of him 'fore he left my gate...
So what's your point?
Ashley's not just some "Snake", Van Zan. She's a flyin' Apocalypse. You can't go stirrin' her up. Van Zan stares at him, his eyes frighteningly glacial. (CONTINUED)
You have no idea what I can do. He walks past Quinn into the
Quinn catches up with him.
Look, I'm the only one alive who's seen the bitch! Trust me. She's older, smarter an' meaner than anything you...
(Turning on him) What she is is their weakness.

What? VAN 2AN (cont'd) All the intel says she's killed every other dragon female. She's the only egg- layer their species has left. We take her out, no more babies. No more babies, no more dragons. No more war.
Bollocks. You've not even seen her eggs.
Have you? (No response.) No. Cause you didn't have the guts to stand with your pal. Beat. Quinn comes close to him, deadly calm.
You callin' me coward, mate?
You're not a coward. You're weak. Tell me, Chief: how many men would you sacrifice to kill a dragon? A hundred? (No response. ) Fifty?
I'm not gonna... (CONTINUED)
One? (Shakes his head) You don't stand and fight. You rescue and run.
And you'd rather kill one a them than Save one a yours.

Yes I would! They're the master fuckin' race, Fireman. They've wiped out every dominant species on this planet and we're next. The only way we're going to live is if we're bloody and ruthless as them!
I'd rather die before I became like them.
That's why you'll lose. Beat. Van Zan turns, walks into the field. Wind picks up, blows through the pipe-gravemarkers. Hollow sounds rise f them, like a hushed chorus of the dead.
...he won't listen to me, Quinn.
Colleen makes repairs on the Blackhawk. Quinn helps her.
Well talk to your crew, then. Tell ‘em it's suicide...
The gears don't turn that way.
Well then how do they bloody turn? Colleen looks at the ramparts a long moment. She sighs.
Ever heard of the Samurai? (CONTINUED)
Japanese scrappers. Why?
When a person became a Samurai, he was considered dead. That's what...
+--what gave him the courage to fight.So?
We've all lost and died, Quinn. Pope snuffed it when he lost his legs. Van Zan when he lost his brother...
Yeah, and I lost me mum. You don't see me walkin' round like a ghoulie.
Well, maybe you need to lose more.
Why? What did you lose?
Enough.
Enough you want to die?
Enough I can't have what I want.
Do you want to stay with him? She is silent.
I'm just askin'. Cause if you don't... there's room here. Beat. He comes closer to her. She shakes her head.
I've seen hundreds of these places, Quinn. It's no way to live...
It is if you're building something. Colleen looks at him. They're quite close. (CONTINUED)
It's not that simple.
Course it is. You just tell him goodbye. Pack your gear...
Change out of my flight suit?
Change out of your flight suit, an'... She starts to unzip her flightsuit.
Well, I didn't quite mean now... Quinn stops. She's unzipped the suit so that just the top her chest is exposed. It is a mass of SCAR TISSUE. Colleen's face has remained impassive.

Snakes flamed my house when I was 8. My nightdress caught fire. Van Zan managed to put it out before it got to my face. (Smiles dryly.) Thank God for small favors, huh? Silence. Colleen zips up the suit, turns to go.
Colleen? (Comes over to her.) You're alive enough for me. She doesn't believe that for a second. Quinn turns her he to look at him.
I'm not...
You are. (Takes her hand.) You're alive. Their fingers begin to intertwine...
The sky is overcast, the first hints of an incoming storm
The firemen are assembled. Quinn looks at them in disbeli
Well...either I'm goin' deaf, or you're goin' mental. Which is it? Uncomfortable beat as Quinn stares into their faces.
It's only a couple days...
Ak "couple days"? You just gonna pop down to London? See the sights, kill The Ashley, come back for tea?
We're askin' for your help, Quinn. Not your permission. Quinn can't believe his ears.
It's like he said, Chief. In London, there's buildings standin'. There's medicine an' food...
In London there's Ashley, and that's it! Christ Jesus, people, don't you remember what it did to Pembry?!
We know it's risky. But we got a chance now. With Van Zan's help...
He hasn't seen the bloody thing. I have.
Ome. An' that 20 years ago. Quinn shoots Eddie a withering look.
I mean...you were a kid. Everything seems ( bigrer then. Your room, your house... (CONTINUED)
She's bigger than my house, Eddie.
I'm just sayin'...
She's bigger than BIG-FUCKIN'-BEN! Quinn OVERTURNS a table filled with equipment; it falls t the floor with a CRASH! Everyone stares at him, wide-eyed
We got a fire drill 3:00 on Ban's Field. Anyone doesn't show up can consider himself off my brigade. Permanently. Quinn leaves.
Quinn sits on the ground by his horse. He stares down at pocket watch. It reads 3:00.

Quinn watching and waiting. The watch now reads 4:15. Non of his firemen have shown up. He hears something, looks up to see Colleen, walking toward him over the blackened hill. She comes near him. An uncomfortable silence.
Denton called a drill same time as yours. Quinn glances around at the obvious lack of people.
Why aren't you with him? She sits opposite him but does not meet his eyes.
I needed to ask you something.
Well, I don't know. As you can see, I'm a rather busy individual... (CONTINUED)
You...you really think we can't win? Beat. Quinn shakes his head.
If he goes up against Ashley, he'll be killing every man, woman and child in my community. He's said this with such even-handed conviction that it's chilling. Colleen is silent, now nervous.
All right. I'll talk to him...
I'm afraid it's beyond that, luv. He goes over to his horse.
What're you doing?
(Mounts his horse) What I shoulda done before.
Quinn, c'mon... (Grabs the horses rein) You're smarter than this. It doesn't have to be about taking sides! He gives her a sad smile, then SPURS his horse forward
Van Zan's soldiers drill with Quinn's firemen. Van Zan himself sits atop his tank, shouting orders into a MEGAPH

...back to one. Right wing, left wheel... The firemen move to reposition themselves. Suddenly, Cree stops. As does Eddie and Danny Goodwin and soon all the rest. Van Zan turns to see they are staring at Quinn, taking a stand near the tank. He holds his pulaski his hands like some sort of medieval weapon. Silence.
I don't got time for your alpha-dog shit. (CONTINUED)
With a huge swing, Quinn SLAMS the pulaski head first int the ground. It's like throwing down a gauntlet.
Make some. The confused firemen look at their chief, then Van Zan.
You got a beef with me, come up and settle it like an adult.
Why don't you come down and settle it like a man? Van Zan just rolls his eyes.

Or do you just do crippled kids? At that, Van Zan's face goes terribly and utterly dark. I dead silence, he descends from the Abrams, walks to Quinn Slow, imminent. A casual avalanche of rage. Quinn holds his ground up to the moment Van Zan's upon hi SLAM! It's not clear who throws the first blow, and it doesn't really matter. Within moments, the two are lettin into each other with all the fury they can muster. Creedy tries to intervene, but Gideon holds him back.

He picked it... The fight quickly degenerates into a brutal mano e mano street brawl. Neither English or Americans dare interfere Easily the better fighter, Van Zan slams Quinn with a ser of blows that sends him to the ground. But Quinn won't quit. He rises, charges the man, knocks h back. Van Zan pulls a reversal, hurls Quinn into the tank Quinn slumps painfully, but catches himself before fallin He shakily regains his footing, faces off with Van Zan ag
Aren't we just "Mr. Come-and-Get-It"? Quinn charges and the two come together in a deathlock. A immovable object meeting an irresistible force, Van Zan (CONTINUED)
punches him repeatedly, trying to dislodge him. But Quinn won't let go, even as his insides are hammered into jello Colleen comes running through the gates, sees the brawl.
Her actions open a floodgate. Men from both sides interve to separate them.
Quinn wakes painfully in his cot. Face bruised ribs banda He looks up to see Creedy sitting beside him. The Cumbria leans over, puts a cup to Quinn's lips.
(Barely a whisper) What's this?
Water. Quinn pushes it away. They stare at each other. Creedy's face is a mix of emotion.
Quinn Abercromby, resident earth mother. Saves everyone, makes everything okay. Well, it's not okay, Quinn. Look at you! Quinn just looks at him.
Don't look at me like tha'. You think I wanted this?
Don't know...what you want...
What I want? You wanna know what I fookin' want? (Beat) I want a proper oven! The admission's comical except for the catch in his voice
That's right. And matchin' steak knives. And green groceries. I wanna feed people (MORE) (CONTINUED)

CREEDY (cont'd) till they're sick in the face. (Sits) I want children. I wanna know they'll outlive me. (Looks at Quinn, eyes wet.) I don't want to be afraid anymore. Silence. Quinn takes Creedy's hand.
You want...too much... Quinn closes his eyes, slips back into unconsciousness. Creedy turns round, sees Van Zan standing in the doorway. He's pretty beat up, but still burning with belief.

Walk back toward the tunnel. Quinn glances at the opening to the cavern.

(Over headset) Van Zan, I told you...
Do it!

Quinn slowly edges toward the opening, keeping the explos raised, keeping his eyes locked with Ashley. Ashley watches with her working right eye, looking for a chance to strike without activating Quinn's explosive.
CLOSE on Van Zan's foot as he steps on a piece of machine
Quinn walks backwards into the tunnel as Ashley slides forward, keeping pace.
Van Zan's hand brushes dust from a CONTROL PANEL.
Quinn comes to the intersection of the t-junction. Ashley's tongue snakes out of her mouth toward him, just waiting to get a taste.
Any time you're ready. Really. Quinn passes the t-junction of the intersection.
(CONTINUED)
Ashley comes into view. She can't see what lies in the tunnel to the left of her because of her blinded eye.
That'll do. Van Zan's hand comes down on a gearshift. And the tunnel is filled with the ROAR of
Barrelling down the tunnel right at Ashley's blind side. Zan in the driver's seat, like a knight on his mount. Ashley realizes the trap. She tries to pull back... Van Zan floors it....

head_text.subj: THE TBM DRILLS INTO ASHLEY'S NECK, PINNING HER TO THE WAL

text: Running to the eastern tunnels, Colleen hears Ashley's scream, amplified a hundred-fold. She rounds a corner to
Struggling against the TBM. Her tongue LASHES OUT, knocki Quinn backward.
keeps his foot on the TBM's accelerator, keeping her pinn
runs to Quinn, helps him to his feet.
I've got her here! Get out!!
No!
Van Zan!
This is my deal, Goddammit! Quinn and Colleen look at him. It's as if Van Zan is pour all his fury into this final attack. (CONTINUED)
Go!!! There's no time to argue. Quinn and Colleen take off.

The two race for the construction hole. Ashley's amplified shrieks mix with the metallic grind of TBM. It sounds like a mythical battle between two subterranean giants. “INT. UNCOMPLETED TUBE TUNNEL (VAN ZAN) The dragon THRASHES. The TBM starts to become DISLODGED. Van Zan keeps up the pressure on the accelerator. But SMO is beginning to pour from the TBM's engines.
Quinn and Colleen make it to the bottom of the hole. They Start to climb like hell.

Van Zan puts all his effort into the TBM's forward motion Machine smoke fills the air. It's fighting the inevitable. With a horrible grind, the TBM's motor LOCKS... ...and Ashley tosses her head to the side.
is knocked backward, slamming against the wall with such force that the cab compartment is CRUSHED.
The crash echoes up to the ears of Quinn and Colleen, in middle of their ascent.
They double time it toward the surface.  117.

Van Zan lies crushed in the wreckage of the cak. He looks to see Ashley's face right over him. Ashley's eye falls upon Van Zan's hand. It has reached th trigger mechanism. Van Zan smiles a bloody smile.
Kiss my human ass... Ashley rears back. Van Zan presses the button.
The explosives DETONATE all along the tunnels...causing A CHAIN REACTION of even greater explosions from the eggs.
Quinn and Colleen have just made it to the surface when t earth underneath shakes from the underground explosions.
The egg-filled chamber IGNITES. A GIGANTIC BLAST SLAMS through into
the concussion is so great it BLASTS the dragon down the tunnel like a missile through a silo.

Huge rents in the ground BREAK OPEN, followed by GEYSERS FLAME. It's as if hell has come to trade places with eart Colleen's THROWN BACK by one explosion, falling onto twis metal. One shard pierces through her leg. She cries out.
Colleen! Quinn gets to her, picks her up in a fireman's carry.  118.
Quinn races with Colleen down the street. Its like runnin through a war zone. Earth shaking...eggs exploding in fireballs... °
Nearing the bank, Quinn sees their chance at escape.
parked in the dry river. Quinn begins to make for it when suddenly behind them
Her whcle body is AFLAME. A fiery angel, she blasts into
Climbing hundreds of feet in seconds...higher...higher... And then begins to DROP, like a flaming comet down to ear
Quinn and Colleen look up.
Smart bitch...

CLOSE ON ASHLEY diving down. She is using the velocity of hex descent to PUT THE FIRE ON HER BODY OUT. At fifty feet, the fire's extinguished. She arcs up... ...and sails over Quinn and Colleen. The force of her pas is like a jet; it knocks both the humans down on the grou Ashley doesn't even bother with them now, but heads STRAI INTO THE INFERNO OF LONDON.
Ashley beats her wings furiously, driving the fire away f an area where some of her eggs lie undamaged. (CONTINUED)
She gathers her eggs to her belly. A FLAP OF SKIN folds o revealing a MARSUPIAL-LIKE POUCH. Into this she pulls her progeny.
looking on in horror.
Jesus Christ, she's saving her kids! Quinn makes a snap decision. He immediately heads for
With Colleen over his shoulder, Quinn quickly climbs down bank into the glassy surface.
Her stomach now BLOATED TO CAPACITY WITH EGGS, Ashley ope her mouth, catches a dozen or so more under her tongue.
Quinn gently lays Colleen down by the glassy bottom.
Winds blowing north. Fire won't touch you here. Quinn turns toward the Mosquito.
Where are you going?! Quinn doesn't answer, just books toward the plane.
Now loaded to capacity with her eggs, Ashley begins to ta to the air. She's like an overloaded B-52.
Quinn taxis the Mosquito down the glassy bed, into the ai
Dawn starts to break over the burning city, framing Ashley, sailing the wind eastward... (CONTINUED)
And Quinn's Mosquito, right on her tail.
Quinn's pushing the damaged plane to its limit to catch u It starts to SHAKE, barely held together by gum and strin
Ashley swoops over the Thames River Barrier to the wet pa of the river.
Come on, luv... He lines up the sights on his forward guns.
Show me your belly. He FIRES.
Machine gun fire RAKES over Ashley's back. Barely an annoyance, but she seems to know what Quinn is trying to In reaction, she pitches down toward the river.
Dammit!

Ashley's SKIMMING THE SURFACE OF THE RIVER. Barely 10 fee above it, the tips of her great wings touch the water on every downbeat, forcing a wake to form. The Mosquito follows behind, skimming the surface as well
Quinn maneuvers for a way to get to her egg-filled gut.
The Mosquito swerves left, trying to get under Ashley's w (CONTINUED)

FLICK! The dragon's tail SNAPS out, nearly striking the Mosquito's wing. Quinn swerves just in time. FLICK! FLICK! The dragon's tail is like a giant fly Swatter, trying to bat the plane out of the sky. But each slash of the tail leaves her underside exposed.
And Quinn takes advantage, firing his guns.

CLOSE ON Ashley's belly. The bullets tear awfully close t the eggsack. Ashley counters with a move of her own. She opens her mou begins to release some of the eggs there. The eggs fall right in the path of the Mosquito which is Still firing. Its tracer bullet rip into the eggs. BOOM! The eggs EXPLODE near the plane like depth charges.
Jolts rock the plane. Quinn's barely able to stabilize he He knows the aircraft can't take much more of this.
Ashley speeds down the estuary, headed toward the open se
Quinn sees accelerates the plane in a final burst of spee
Still skimming the water, Ashley passes over the coast an makes the freedom of the open ocean. However as she's flies from land to sea The Mosquito accelerates, FLYING RIGHT OVER HER BACK.
Quinn looks down. It's like passing over an island of rep skin, her wingspan nearly the size of a football field.  122.
The Mosquito flies over Ashley's head to take a position RIGHT IN FRONT OF HER.

Ashley sees the challenger in front of her. She decides t end this once and for all. She opens her mouth, releasing the last of the eggs kept there. Then, takes in a HUGE BREATH... And BLAM! LETS LOOSE HER LARGEST BLAST OF PHOSPHOROUS EVE The Mosquito dodges. But the blast TEARS into the ocean f a quarter of a mile, sending up a WALL OF SUPERHEATED STE The Mosquito turns into the steam wall for cover. Ashley follows, firing another blast.
BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The sound of multiple phosphorous strik hitting the water are like thunder. Quinn smiles. He begins to puil up.
By striking the water so many times, Ashley has created a FOGBANK. It's impossible to see within.

Ashley swoops blindly, skimming, listening for Quinn's pl The sound of the Mosquito gets farther...farther... It seems to be heading upward. Ashley stares up. Now's her chance. She begins to arc up out of the fog bank...  123.
And sees...nothing. The plane's DISAPPEARED. But the buzzing is now getting louder. It's then she-noti
arcing hundreds of feet above her UPSIDE DOWN. It's at 12:00, EXECUTING a wild LOOP over the dragon.
In a last desperate move, Quinn, upside down, guides the plane back over the dragon...

Too late, Ashley realizes what Quinn is doing. The Mosquito is now diving BEHIND the dragon. Its loop no is accelerated by its descent. At the 7:00 point, it begins to PULL UP with huge speed. What happens next is so quick, it's nearly simultaneous.
opens the canopy of his plane.
tries to dive.
arcs upward.
releases his belt and is sucked from the cockpit. SLAM! He hits the water at an angle at a savage 70 miles hour. His body SKIPS LIKE A STONE over the ocean just as
is carried in its course by the force of its acceleration ..-heading right into Ashley's egg-filled stomach.
(CONTINUED)
tries to avoid it, but
strikes home, SLAMMING INTO HER BELLY. Ashley's stomach EXPLODES! AND THE GREAT DRAGON IS LITERALLY RIPPED IN TWO.
Quinn recovers his sense barely in time to see
from the blast, swelling right towards him. s QUINN
He dives just as the WAVE hits him full on.
Quinn is jostled to and fro under the wave.
The fiery remains of the dragon fall from the sky like ra
With his last strength, Quinn kicks with all his might to

Quinn breaks the surface, GASPING for air. The water around is filled with burning debris. And there, not ten yards away, floats THE ASHLEY'S SEVERE HEAD. Bobbing lifeless as it sinks. Quinn watches it, sees himself reflected in the cornea of one eye, just as he had seen himself as a child. Soon, the reflection and eye and the last of the dragon disappear under the water. HOLD ON the burning debris
Burning debris CROSSFADES into BOATS. All shapes and size filled with refugees heading toward the coast of England
CLOSE on a pile of dragon eggs arranged in a huge PIT in ground.

An explosive charge DETONATES in the middle of the pit, reducing the their embryos to lifeless shreds. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Creedy supervising a CREW OF MEN AND WOMEN in the orderly disposal of remaining dragon eggs. PULL BACK FURTHER to reveal the rest of the park. A myria of TENTS are pitched throughout the park. A CARAVAN full new arrivals are busy preparing a campsite. TUFTS OF GREEN GRASS speckle the blackened hills. There's even a bit of sunlight peeking through the clouds. PAN OVER to a distant hill where a lone figure stands.

It's Quinn standing before what looks like a rough milita graveyard. British flags fly from some; The American from others. The dead in the war with Ashley. Quinn kneels down by one that flies the DON’T TREAD ON ME early American flag with the snake. It's there he places flask he took from Van Zan in the boat.
He actually stole that flask from me. Quinn turns to see Colleen behind him. No longer wearing flight suit, but a dress that covers her arms and legs. Quinn smiles.
French delegation's here. They want to talk about an expedition to retake the continent.
You wanna be in on it? (CONTINUED)
Do you? Quinn shakes his head, looks down at the grave.
Guess we owe it to him to keep fightin’.
Just him, huh? She nods at Beth and a group of the castle kids, playing soccer nearby.
Won't exactly be a cakewalk. They say there's at least four of 'em in Paris.
That's not what bothers me, Col. (Looks at her.) What if Van Zan was wrong about Ashley? What if there still other females? What do we do then? Colleen takes his hand.
We live. Hearing his own words thrown back at him, Quinn has to sm He kisses her gently, puts his arm around her. They walk together from the graveyard. Toward a city being reborn.
